description: This is a primer developed for the Kite tabletop system focuses on building games
with a classic fantasy theme (swords and sorcery). It defines everything which
players need to create characters and everything a dungeon master will need to

Initiative: Players roll 1d6 at the start of combat and then add their speed
stat as well as any modifications from weapons and armor to determine
battle order. Highest value goes first, lowest value goes last.

Races: Adds the concept of racial abilities, languages, and stat/skill bonuses

Classes: Adds a job system to the game, players can still create their own character
from scratch and these are more of guidelines vs. hard set restrictions on

Crafting: Adds the ability for users to craft equipment and items themselves from purchased
